data.Title: Welcome
data.Content: Welcome to the game. Have a good time! If you encounter any problems with the game, please contact customer service for help.

data.Title: Selamat datang
data.Content: Selamat datang di permainan. Semoga harimu menyenangkan! Jika anda memiliki masalah dalam permainan, hubungi customer service untuk bantuan.
